Title: Stitch Fix
CO_managers: Barclays/ RBC Capital Markets/ Piper Jaffray/ Stifel/ William Blair
Business: Stitch Fix was inspired by the vision of a client-first, client-centric new way of retail. What people buy and wear matters. When we serve our clients well, we help them discover and define their styles, we find jeans that fit and flatter their bodies, we reduce their anxiety and stress when getting ready in the morning, we give them confidence in job interviews and on first dates and we give them time back in their lives to invest in themselves or spend with their families.
